item.title: Exploring Tidymodels
item.description: Introduction The primary objective of this notebook is to explore the tidymodels predictive model framework. I am familiar with the caret package but as Max Kuhn has replaced caret with tidymodels and it has been available for a couple of years, I thought it a good time to take it for a test ride. To enable me to explore the framework a churn dataset provided by Shurti_lyyer on Kaggle will be used.
